about_the_game:
An action game to rescue a cat from the forest.
Find lost cats in the forest and bring them home!

There are various and numerous cats hidden in the forest.
The kittens lost their way out of curiosity about outside the house!
The villain cat that disturbs the hero cat!
Scary ghost cat that appears only at night!
A giant cat that's bigger than other cats!
All these cats start following you as soon as they run into you.

A variety of fun and interesting stages.
To avoid obstacles and open a closed door,
you must press the switch with a moving box.
You need a fish sword to defeat the villain cats who are after you.
Be careful not to fall when crossing a single-wood bridge.
Ghost cats follow you when they don't make eye contact with you.
Be careful not to show your back.
To overcome these difficulties, quick control and concentration are required.
However, it is an action arcade game that is not difficult and easy for anyone to play.

Fall for the cats that follow you around.
And look for hidden stages, too.

name: Cat Follow Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cat Action Adventure! Find lost cats in the forest and bring them home!
